competitions.name: 第十五届中国计算机设计大赛—智慧导盲组
competitions.description: 2022年飞桨承办了”中国计算机设计大赛“两个赛道。智慧导盲组引导参赛队将飞桨与四足仿生机器人相结合，聚焦城市导盲的现实场景，打造融技术、人文和竞技于一体的高水平赛事。晋级校赛即可获得机器狗的免费借用权。

competitions.name: 第十五届中国计算机设计大赛—智慧工厂组
competitions.description: 2022年飞桨承办了”中国计算机设计大赛“两个赛道。智慧工厂组采取半开放命题的方式，聚焦“工业+人工智能+物联网”，选手可以在主题范围内发挥创意，并完成方案设计与系统开发。晋级校赛即可获得物联网基础模块“口袋机”的免费借用权。

competitions.name: 香港置地2022年置慧杯：商业综合体能耗预测
competitions.description: 2022年置慧杯由香港置地主办，并由百度飞桨平台提供独家赛事技术支持，本次大赛主题是预测大型商业综合体的能耗数据。

competitions.name: 2022 CVPR track1：Supernet Track
competitions.description: This track tries to narrow the performance gap between candidates with the parameters extracted from the shared parameters and the same architectures with the parameter trained independently.

competitions.name: 2022 CVPR track2：Performance Estimation
competitions.description: Predict the performance of any architectures accurately without training.

competitions.name: Baidu KDD CUP 2022
competitions.description: Spatial Dynamic Wind Power Forecasting. This task has practical importance for the utilization of wind energy. Participants are expected to accurately estimate the wind power supply of a wind farm.

competitions.name: 2022语言与智能技术竞赛：段落检索
competitions.description: 提供大规模的段落检索评测集，挑战机器检索相关段落的能力

competitions.name: 2022语言与智能技术竞赛：知识对话
competitions.description: 让系统具备利用搜索引擎知识进行开放域对话交互的能力，提升对话的时效性、丰富性和准确性

competitions.name: 2022语言与智能技术竞赛：情感可解释评测
competitions.description: 评估情感分析模型的可解释性，即从合理性、一致性等维度评测模型预测所依赖的证据

competitions.name: 2022语言与智能技术竞赛：视频语义理解
competitions.description: 让机器对视频进行内容分析与理解。在感知内容分析的基础上，融合知识、语言、视觉、语音等多模信息，结合知识计算与推理，为视频生成相应的语义标签

competitions.name: CVPR 2022 AliProducts Challenge:  Large-scale Cross-Modal Product Retrieval(赛季 1)
competitions.description: The challenge is based on a dataset released by Alibaba, which contains near 3 million images and covers 50 thousands SKU level commodity categories. It is the first time that an industry scale and granularity dataset becomes available for the computer vision research community to understand and help tackle the challenge in real-world commodity image recognition.

competitions.name: ICME-2022 安全AI挑战者计划第九期：小样本商标检测挑战赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 商品标识作为企业家的知识产权代表，应避免受恶意使用和剽窃。为保护商品标识资质、降低知识产权风险，我们提出小样本电商标标识检测挑战赛。

competitions.name: 第三届阿里云磐久智维算法大赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 第一届和第二届智能运维算法大赛，我们针对异常预测开展了积极的探索和卓有成效的实践。本届大赛我们延续对异常/故障这一领域的深入挖掘，以根因诊断为赛题，和各界同仁一起探讨根因诊断的新思路，共同追逐这一人工智能应用的明珠。

competitions.name: “阿里灵杰”问天引擎电商搜索算法赛(赛季 1)
competitions.description: 受疫情催化影响，近一年内全球电商及在线零售行业进入高速发展期。作为线上交易场景的重要购买入口，搜索行为背后是强烈的购买意愿，电商搜索质量的高低将直接决定最终的成交结果，因此在AI时代，如何通过构建智能搜索能力提升线上GMV转化成为了众多电商开发者的重要研究课题。本次比赛由阿里云天池平台和问天引擎联合举办，诚邀社会各界开发者参与竞赛，共建AI未来。

competitions.name: Alibaba Cloud Low-Code Development Contest 2022(赛季 2)
competitions.description: Alibaba Cloud Low-Code Development Contest is a virtual solution building contest for professionals and students in India, Singapore, Thailand, Pakistan, Sri Lanka and Nepal, co-organized by Alibaba Cloud Tianchi and IndiaSpark.

competitions.name: Re-Cloud Challenges 2022(赛季 3)
competitions.description: Re-Cloud Challenges 2022, co-hosed by Alibaba Cloud and CodePolitan, is a virtual low-code development competition for participants in Indonesia and Malaysia.

competitions.name: Loan Default Prediction Challenge
competitions.description: A learning competition designed for DSN Bootcamp 2018

competitions.name: Google NLP Hack Series: Intro to ASR Africa Challenge
competitions.description: Calling on the Zindi community to help create automatic speech recognition datasets for African languages

competitions.name: Hulkshare Recommendation Algorithm Challenge
competitions.description: Can you predict if a song on a streaming platform is liked by looking at viewing patterns?

competitions.name: Hack the Continent Open Buildings Challenge
competitions.description: Can you put Google’s Open Buildings Geospatial analysis dataset to good use in Africa?

competitions.name: Turtle Recall: Conservation Challenge
competitions.description: Can you build a facial recognition model... for turtles?
